title: Day 1171
content:
# Day 1171

![[https://www.linkedin.com/posts/conorchepenik_if-theres-one-thing-red-and-blue-can-agree-activity-7336489804626337792-Om-I](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/conorchepenik_if-theres-one-thing-red-and-blue-can-agree-activity-7336489804626337792-Om-I?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop&rcm=ACoAAB67cFgB_eSnNI3e0HKKn-9U1WQ_VjyHBv4)](https://miro.medium.com/1*b4UJZUuX6oTAFxibeHcdwg.png)

Today was a wild day on X. Musk started blasting Trump. Trump was blasting back on Truth social and legacy media which of course got clipped and shared on X. 10/10 day on the internet to be honest.

![[https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1930723386927325206](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1930723386927325206)](https://miro.medium.com/1*HFlvwWU0HZhrUu7BKTj6fQ.png)

![[https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1930705543339123045](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1930705543339123045)](https://miro.medium.com/1*___6WzktEh0onfZlJanOsw.png)

![[https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1930705543339123045](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1930705543339123045)](https://miro.medium.com/0*mHQlV5M-aDOYQDSG)

And throughout all of that I still found time to shitpost and go on a date with my wife. God is good!

6/5/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
